Package org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.render

Interface Summary
AxisRenderer TODO: javadoc
Background Classes that wish to render Plot backgrounds must implement this
FocusPainter Implemented by classes which wish to paint focus indicators for points
LinearGradient Implement this interface to create LinearGradient fill styles for the Canvas
 

Class Summary
AbstractTickLabelFormatter  
BarChartXYRenderer Renders BarCharts on an XYPlot
CircleFocusPainter Draws a circle around a point with focus
DomainAxisRenderer Renders zoomable dates on x-axis
GssElementImpl Convenient class for creating named GssElements
LegendAxisRenderer Renderer used to draw Legend
OverviewAxisRenderer Rendering code used to render OverviewAxis
RangeAxisRenderer Renders vertical range axis
ScalableXYPlotRenderer Implements a XYPlotRenderer that uses multiresolution datasets to minimize the amount of XYRenderer invocations
XYLineRenderer Implementation of XYRenderer which can render scatter plot, lines, points+lines, or filled areas depending on GSS styling used.
XYPlotRenderer Responsible for iterating over datasets in a defined drawing order, and then deciding on how to map the visible portions of the domain onto the associated XYRenderers
XYRenderer Abstract class used classes which render a curve using data
